titles.title: A bill to modify the project for navigation, Union River, Maine.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3066-3067)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
3/13/2007--Introduced.
Modifies the Union River, Maine, navigation project by redesignating a specified portion of the project as an anchorage area.
